transcript: I understand that the best I can do for you at this moment is give you a $50 check courtesy of Northwest Airlines for inconveniencing you and losing your luggage

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I understand that.  The best I can do for you, at this moment, is give you fifty dollar check courtesy of Northwest Airlines for inconveniencing you in losing your luggage.
